title: Jiejian banzhang 截間版帳
description:
Jiejian banzhang 截間版帳, interpretative reconstruction drawing following the YZFS (Image: Wang Lijia 王丽佳)

根據故宮本《營造法式》所載構件及其尺寸、牙頭護縫圖樣等內容，並參考前人學者成果所復原的截間版帳立面及軸測分解（筆者自繪）。因《營造法式》對截間版帳的描述有限，前人學者在復原時也有多處不一致，所以此復原圖雖為在此基礎上試圖更近一步的復原，但不一定準確無誤。

根據故宮本《營造法式》所載構件及其尺寸、牙頭護縫圖樣等內容，並參考前人學者成果所復原的截間版帳立面及軸測分解（筆者自繪）。因《營造法式》對截間版帳的描述有限，前人學者在復原時也有多處不一致，所以此復原圖雖為在此基礎上試圖更近一步的復原，但不一定準確無誤。

title: [huabiao] in front of Tianan Men
description: One of the huabiao in front of Tianan Men, Palace Museum. It was made in Yongle period (1403-1424) with the construction of Tianan Men in the MIng Dynasty. It was moved to present location in 1949. This is a typical stone huabiao placed in front of a high-ranking architecture complex in the Ming and Qing dynasties (1368-1911). (photo: ZHUGE JIng 諸葛淨, 2005, modified by ZHUGE Jing 諸葛淨)

title: [xieshan] Xiehe gate, Palace Museum
description:
Xiehe gate, 1368-1644, Palace Museum, Beijing 北京故宮協和門 (photo 攝影: Jia Tingli 賈亭立, 2017)
It was called Zuoshun gate 左順門and Huiji gate會極門 in the Ming dynasty. The name was changed to Xiehe gate in 1645.

title: Figure01_Yan'e_Dragon_Pavilion_Jiyuan
description:
Longting (aka Linshui ting), Jidu Temple 檐額, 龍亭 (臨水亭), 濟瀆廟, Jiyuan, Henan (Ming, but retaining Song and Yuan elements) 
刘敦桢，梁思成認為是檐額，潘谷西認為只是 "闌額通作."  Liang Sicheng and Liu Dunzhen refer to the horizontal element supported by pillars as an eaves tie beam (檐額), while Pan Guxi believes it is simply a "continuous" lan'e extending across multiple bays (闌額通作). (photo: Xin, CC BY-SA 4.0，https://commons.wikimedia.org/w/index.php?curid=50926537)
